title: NO BROKER FEE!! Avail. September 30th - Updated Kitchen - APPLY TODAY!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41108350', 'Rent: $2,175 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'First and Last Month to Move In ONLY!!!', '  NO BROKER FEE!!', '  1 Bed 1 Bath unit in Brighton - APPLY NOW!!', 'Features include beautiful hardwood floors and large windows bearing beautiful natural sunlight.', 'Located on Commonwealth Avenue, easy access to restaurants, dining, shopping and nightlife.', 'MBTA Green Line B just outside your door for easy access to Chestnut Hill and Downtown Boston.', 'Heat and Hot Water Included!', 'Laundry in Building!', 'Off street parking options available for a fee!', 'NO BROKER FEE .', 'Available September 30, 2022', 'ONLY First Month and Last Month required upon move-in.', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @', '<URL> 860 - 309 - 8511', 'Tram: B Chiswick Road (0.05 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.16 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.33 mi)', 'Tram: C Cleveland Circle (0.26 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Euston St (0.46 mi)', '41108350', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Shopping Accessible', 'T Accessible', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
